articles.author: Karen Gilchrist
articles.title: Russia vows to retaliate if EU gives frozen assets to Kyiv; Ukraine hit with overnight drone attack - CNBC
articles.description: Russia on Thursday vowed to retaliate in kind if the European Union moved ahead with plans to hand profits generated from Russia's frozen assets to Ukraine.
articles.content:
Former TV journalist Yekaterina Duntsova put her name forward on Wednesday to stand in a Russian presidential election in March that Vladimir Putin is expected to win by a landslide.
